mean_cn: v. 打（谷），（用棍、鞭等）痛打，打败，使逆行，胜过；  n. 敲击摇滚乐
mean_en: to hit a person or an animal many times with a stick, etc. as a punishment; to move or make something move in a violent or uncontrolled way; to defeat somebody very easily in a game
sentence: The farmer is thrashing paddy in this harvest season.
sentence_trans: 在这个收获的季节，农民正在打谷。
